page.title: 06SHOPPING CENTRE SUTTON C'FLD
page.content: {Gracechurch Centre}was designed by the Harry Weedon partnership and cost{Â£12 million}to build.It was officially opened in 1974 and the manager is a Mr.Edmonds.There are about{eighty shops}in the centre at present.The first of those to be opened was 'Dunn's' in 1973.The largest shop is{'Marks and Spencer'. In Summer the security staff have problems with glue sniffers,vandalism, and young people occupying the seats intended for resting shoppers,but the main problem is{shop-lifting. } In total{1500 people}work at the centre.The turnover each year is on average{150 million pounds.}The site is 8\ acres in size. Mr.Edmonds does his weekly shopping at the centre and says he wouldn't let his wife shop anywhere else!
